data.title: Ozzy Osbourne Bio, Age, Net Worth, Wife, Children, Siblings, Parents
data.meta_description: Ozzy Osbourne is a popular English singer, songwriter, and actor who first gained fame as the lead vocalist of the heavy metal band Black Sabbath. Ozzy Osbourneis widely regarded as one of the pioneers of heavy metal and is known for his distinctive voice and flamboyant stage presence.
data.text:
Ozzy Osbourne is a popular English singer, songwriter, and actor who first gained fame as the lead vocalist of the heavy metal band Black Sabbath.

Ozzy Osbourne is widely regarded as one of the pioneers of heavy metal and is known for his distinctive voice and flamboyant stage presence.

Over the course of his career, Osbourne has sold more than 100 million records and won several Grammy Awards. He has also been inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame.

Ozzy Osbourneâs musical career started in the late 1960s when he joined the heavy metal band Black Sabbath as the lead vocalist.

The bandâs self-titled debut album, âBlack Sabbath,â was released in 1970 and is considered one of the defining albums of heavy metal music.

Osbourneâs powerful vocals, combined with the bandâs innovative and heavy sound, helped establish Black Sabbath as one of the biggest and most influential bands in the genre.

Osbourne remained with the band until 1979 and went on to pursue a successful solo career, releasing numerous albums and touring extensively throughout the world.

Ozzy Osbourne announced his retirement at the age of 74.

Table of Contents

Ozzy Osbourne Biography

Ozzy Osbourne was born on December 3, 1948, in Marston Green, United Kingdom to Jack Osbourne and Lillian Osbourne.

Ozzy Osbourne Net Worth

Ozzy Osbourne is estimated to have a net worth of $220 million. He is one of the richest English singers, songwriters, and actors in the world.

Ozzy Osbourne Wife

Ozzy Osbourne is currently married to Sharon Osbourne. They have been married since 1982.

Ozzy Osbourne Children

Ozzy Osbourne is a father of six children who are Kelly Osbourne, Aimee Osbourne, Jack Osbourne, Jessica Starshine Osbourne, Elliot Kingsley, and Louis Osbourne.

Ozzy Osbourne Siblings

Ozzy Osbourne has five siblings who are Paul Osbourne, Jean Osbourne, Iris Osbourne, Gillian Osbourne, and Tony Osbourne.

Ozzy Osbourne Parents

Ozzy Osbourne is the son of John Thomas âJackâ Osbourne and Lillian Osbourne.
